name: microsoft-copilot-chat-frontier
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot (Search) (Frontier)
summary: Enables core Microsoft Copilot chat actions, including starting conversations and sending messages with contextual grounding.
description: Enables core Microsoft Copilot chat actions, including starting conversations and sending messages with contextual grounding.

useCases.name: Start a Copilot conversation
useCases.description: Initialize a new Copilot chat session for a user or agent-driven workflow, returning a conversation identifier and initial system state.

useCases.name: Send chat message
useCases.description: Send a user or agent message into an active Copilot conversation and receive Copilot's reply, supporting rich text and attachments where applicable.

useCases.name: Continue multi-turn conversation
useCases.description: Continue an existing conversation using the conversation identifier, preserving context and dialogue history to enable coherent multi-turn interactions.

useCases.name: Provide contextual resources
useCases.description: Attach files, documents, or structured context (links, knowledge snippets) to a conversation so Copilot can ground its responses in the provided resources.

useCases.name: Include user & time context
useCases.description: Supply user-specific metadata (profile, locale, time zone) and session context to ensure responses respect local time, personalization, and regional formatting.
